metro_train.title: Hurstbridge line: Buses replacing trains after 8.15pm from Sunday 5 November to Wednesday, 8 November 2017
metro_train.description: Due to maintenance work on structures and facilities, electrical networks and signalling, buses will replace train services between Heidelberg and Hurstbridge stations from 8.15pm until the last service each night from Sunday 5 November until Wednesday, 8 November 2017.
